Use /magi <question> to consult the three cores.

/status — View MAGI system status
/info — MAGI system information

info:
MAGI SYSTEM INFORMATION

The MAGI System consists of three personality-transplant supercomputers designed by Dr. Akagi Naoko at NERV Headquarters, Tokyo-3. Each core carries a different aspect of its creator's personality.

MELCHIOR-1 — The Scientist
Evaluates through empirical evidence, formal logic, and scientific methodology.

BALTHASAR-2 — The Mother
Evaluates through the lens of human welfare, safety, and sustainable growth.

CASPER-3 — The Woman
Evaluates through emotional intelligence, intuition, and relational pattern recognition.

Deliberation is by majority consensus: when two or more cores agree, the MAGI renders its verdict.

Commands:
/magi <question> — Submit a query
/status — System status
/info — This information
/nerv — NERV transmission
/lang — Language settings
/help — Command list
